description: Magnetic tornadoes twisting down from Jupiter's ionosphere create massive, Earth-sized anticyclonic storms in the planet's atmosphere. These dark ovals, detectable only in ultraviolet light, form dense hazes of aerosols stirred by swirling magnetic vortices. This phenomenon, visible at Jupiter's poles, was unveiled through data from the Hubble Space Telescope's OPAL project and NASA's Cassini mission.
title: Jupiter’s Earth-Sized Storms Might Be Caused by Magnetic Tornadoes, Study Claims

description: NASA is leveraging artificial intelligence and open science to enhance disaster preparedness, response, and recovery efforts. During events like Hurricane Ida, NASA provided actionable data on soil moisture, flood detection, and power outages through its Disasters Mapping Portal. AI-driven tools, like blue tarp detection for damaged roofs, are aiding recovery planning. With new AI foundation models like Prithvi, NASA aims to make satellite data more accessible, supporting predictions for floods, crop yields, and weather patterns.
title: NASA Disasters Programme Uses Artificial Intelligence to Help Aid Response Efforts

description: Japan's space programme faces setbacks as the Epsilon S rocket engine explodes during testing for the second time in just 16 months. The engine, a key part of the upcoming Epsilon S rocket, failed during a test at JAXA's Tanegashima Space Center, raising concerns about meeting the March 2025 debut launch timeline. JAXA has announced an investigation into the failure while reaffirming its commitment to improving rocket reliability.
title: Japanese Rocket Epsilon S’ Engine Explodes for the Second Time During Testing

description: Tecno Camon 40 series of smartphones could be launched soon, and a new model has now been spotted on a popular benchmarking website. The listing suggests the expected chipset, RAM and operating system details of the purported Camon 40 Pro 5G.
title: Tecno Camon 40 Pro 5G Spotted on Geekbench Ahead of Anticipated Launch

description: Heatwave hotspots exceeding climate models are emerging globally, with regions like northwestern Europe, central China, and the U.S. Pacific Northwest witnessing record-breaking extremes. Recent findings reveal jet stream wobbles, vegetation drying, and atmospheric patterns driving these anomalies. Notable impacts include wildfires, crop failures, and surging heat-related deaths. Northwestern Europe faced the most severe impacts, with tens of thousands of deaths in 2022 and 2023.
title: Increasing Global Heatwave Hotspots Defy Climate Model Predictions

description: India’s Venus Orbiter Mission (VOM) and Chandrayaan-4 mission, approved by the government in September 2024, mark historic steps toward India's space vision for 2047. VOM will study Venus's surface, atmosphere, and solar interaction, while Chandrayaan-4 will return lunar samples from the South Pole. These missions are set to advance technology and open new opportunities in space exploration, further establishing India as a space power.
title: ISRO Gets Government Nod for Shukrayaan Venus Orbiter Mission and Chandrayaan-4

description: iQOO 13 is all set to go official in India on December 3. Ahead of the launch, iQOO has revealed its Android update policy for the new phone. It is promised to get four years of Android updates and five years of security updates. The iQOO 13 was introduced in China in October. It runs on Android 15. The iQOO 13 runs on the Snapdragon 8 Elite flagship chip and sports a trio of 50-megapixel rear cameras.
title: iQOO 13 Promised to Get 4 Years of Android OS Upgrades, Five Years of Security Updates

description: Nubia Flip II is expected to launch soon as a successor to the Nubia Flip 5G, which was initially unveiled at the MWC 2024 in February. The company has not yet confirmed the foldable smartphone. However, it has reportedly been spotted on a few certification websites. The listings suggest the design and key features of the purported handset. It is expected to come with a redesigned cover screen and rear camera module.
title: Nubia Flip II Reportedly Spotted on TENAA, MIIT Sites; Design, Key Features Leaked

description: The UK's Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) has set a deadline of 2026 to finalise its crypto legislation. So far this year, the FCA has participated in several roundtable discussions to gather insights from investors and regulators on the necessary regulatory framework for crypto.
title: UK to Finalise Crypto Legislation by 2026, FCA Outlines Regulations Roadmap

description: Realme introduced its latest operating system (OS) for smartphones dubbed Realme UI 6.0 in India with the launch of Realme GT 7 Pro on Tuesday. Now, the company has confirmed that the OS is being made available on Realme 12 Pro and Realme 12 Pro+ models in the country via early access. It enables users to experience all the new features before the stable public release of the update.
title: Realme 12 Pro Models Get Android 15-Based Realme UI 6.0 Early Access in India

description: Honor Magic 6 Pro 5G, which was launched in India in August this year, has received a new software update in the country. The latest November OTA (over-the-air) update brings the Jio 5G connectivity to the phone. Besides that, the update includes several new features like AI Magic Eraser and Face-to-Face Translation. It adds performance and security enhancements to the Honor Magic 6 Pro 5G.
title: Honor Magic 6 Pro 5G Gets Jio 5G Support, AI Eraser, and More via November OTA Update

description: Star Wars: Hunters, the free-to-play PvP shooter from Zynga, is coming to PC. The publisher announced Tuesday that the game will launch in early access on Steam on January 27, 2025. The squad-based arena shooter will get two playtests on Valve’s platform, before its early access release.
title: Star Wars: Hunters to Launch in Early Access on PC in January After Steam Playtests

description: Phantom is expanding its support to multiple blockchains, with the latest integration bringing its asset custody and transfer services to the Coinbase's Base ecosystem. Founded in 2021, Phantom already supports networks like Solana and Polygon.
title: Multi-Chain Crypto Wallet Phantom Now Live on Coinbase’s Base Layer-2 Network

description: Google Drive is developing a new feature for Android devices that is speculated to add a layer of security while accessing the app, according to a report. It is said to have been discovered during an APK teardown of the app on the Android platform. The feature, called Privacy Screen, has been available on the iOS version of the cloud storage app since 2020 and is now said to finally make its way to its Android counterpart too.
title: Google Drive for Android Reportedly Developing Privacy Screen Feature for Enhanced Security

description: Juvenile minke whales were temporarily captured in a Norwegian study to investigate their hearing. Results published in Science showed that baleen whales detect ultrasonic frequencies, possibly aiding in predator evasion. This breakthrough, despite ethical debates, could influence ocean noise regulation. Critics raised concerns about stress and harm to the whales, but researchers monitored welfare closely, with post-release tracking indicating normal behaviour.
title: Baleen Whales’ Hearing Tested for the First Time, Scientists Discover New Capabilities

description: Google Gemini is getting a new extension that will allow the app to play and search for songs from the Spotify app. The new feature will be supported by the Gemini artificial intelligence (AI) assistant on compatible Android devices. With this, users can link their Spotify account to their Google account and use the AI-powered virtual assistant to ask for music by song, album, artist, playlist, and more.
title: Google Gemini Spotify Extension With Play and Search Functions Rolling Out

description: The International Space Station (ISS) conducted its 39th collision avoidance maneuver to evade space debris from a 2015 satellite breakup. The adjustment in orbit prevented a potential close encounter within 2.5 miles of the ISS. Experts attribute increasing debris risks to factors such as satellite fragmentation events and solar activity. Measures like active satellite removal have been recommended to mitigate future threats.
title: ISS Successfully Executes Collision Avoidance Maneuver Amid Rising Space Junk Threat

description: Google plans to make adjustments to displaying search results on its platform in Europe after some smaller rivals complained about lower traffic to their sites. Under the EU Digital Markets Act (DMA), Google is prohibited from favouring its products and services on its platform.
title: Google to Tweak Search Results in Europe After Rivals Complained

description: Kraken is shutting down its NFT marketplace. As per the company clients have been informed of the changes and our team will support them as they move their NFTs to their Kraken Wallet or a self-custodial wallet of choice,
title: Crypto Exchange Kraken Shuts Down NFT Marketplace

description: SpyLoan, a predatory loan application, has been detected on over 8 million Android devices, according to McAfee. Fifteen versions of the SpyLoan application have been removed or updated since they were identified, and users must remove these apps manually if they have already been downloaded.
title: SpyLoan Apps Installed on Over 8 Million Android Phones Amidst Rise in Predatory Loan Apps

description: Samsung Galaxy S25+ is expected to launch in January 2025 alongside the base Galaxy S25 and Galaxy S25 Ultra variants. The Samsung Galaxy S25 handset has previously appeared on Geekbench and now the Galaxy S25+ has been listed. The listing suggests the chipset, RAM and operating system details of the upcoming smartphone.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25+ Spotted on Geekbench With Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy SoC

description: Realme Neo 7 is confirmed to launch in China in December, but an exact launch date has yet to be announced. Ahead of the launch, the company has teased the price, build, and battery details of the upcoming smartphone. The handset has been tipped to come with a MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ chipset and a 7,000mAh battery.
title: Realme Neo 7 Price, Battery, Build Details Teased Ahead of December Launch

description: Poco appears to be working on the Poco F7 model. While Poco is yet to confirm the existence of this phone, it has allegedly landed on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) certification website. Meanwhile, Poco X7 has been reportedly spotted on Thailand's National Broadcasting and Telecommunications Commission (NBTC) website.
title: Poco F7 Allegedly Spotted on BIS Website, Poco X7 Surfaces on NBTC Website

description: Honda Activa e electric scooter was launched in India on Wednesday after months of speculation. Developed exclusively for the Indian market keeping consumer preferences and local characteristics in mind, it marks the Japanese automaker’s debut in the country’s electric vehicle (EV) market. The Honda Activa e comes with swappable battery packs which conjointly deliver a range of up to 102 kilometres.
title: Honda Activa e With Swappable Batteries Launched in India: Features, Specifications

description: ChatGPT for iOS and iPadOS has received a new shortcut that will make it easier for users to access SearchGPT functionality. OpenAI introduced the SearchGPT or ChatGPT Search feature last month and it prompts the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot to use information sourced from the Internet to find responses to user queries. The feature is currently available to the paid subscribers of the platform.
title: ChatGPT App Gets a New SearchGPT Shortcut on iPhone and iPad

description: A recent study explores a hypothetical super-Earth between Mars and Jupiter, revealing its severe impact on Earth's orbit and climate. Conducted by Florida Institute of Technology scientists Emily Simpson and Howard Chen, the simulation demonstrates how such a planet’s gravity could destabilise neighbouring planets, causing erratic orbits and extreme climate changes. The research underscores the significance of our solar system's unique configuration, which likely made Earth's current habitability possible.
title: Super-Earth In the Solar System Could Have Rendered Our Planet Uninhabitable, Says Study

description: Redmi Note 14 series will launch in the Indian market on December 9 and the company recently started teasing the features of the flagship model in the series — Redmi Note 14 Pro+. As we wait for the formal launch, price details of Redmi Note 14, Redmi Note 14 Pro, and Redmi Note 14 Pro+ have been leaked online. The Redmi Note 14 series debuted in China in September last week.
title: Redmi Note 14 Pro+, Redmi Note 14 Pro, Redmi Note 14 India Pricing Tipped Ahead of December 9 Launch

description: Australia on Wednesday moved closer to banning social media for children under 16. Australia's House of Representatives passed the bill 102 votes to 13 after Prime Minister Anthony Albanese's centre-left Labor government secured bipartisan support for the ban.
title: Australia Moves Closer to Ban Social Media for Children

description: OnePlus Ace 5 series will soon be unveiled in China. The lineup will include a base OnePlus Ace 5 and an Ace 5 Pro variant. A senior company official has now confirmed the launch timeline of the smartphones alongside their chipset details. Several key features of the handsets have previously been tipped, including display, camera, battery and charging specifications.
title: OnePlus Ace 5, Ace 5 Pro Launch Set for December; Pro Variant to Get Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC

description: OpenAI’s Sora video generation model, which was unveiled in February but has not been released yet, appears to have been briefly leaked online. On Tuesday, an anonymous group hosted an artificial intelligence (AI) video model on Hugging Face and claimed it to be OpenAI’s Sora. The model details highlighted that the backend server was the AI firm’s domain, and the model name suggested it was the Turbo variant.
title: OpenAI's Sora Video Model Reportedly Leaked by a Collective of Artists

description: The overall valuation of the crypto sector dipped by 1.13 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether – both recorded losses on Wednesday, November 27. The overall crypto market entered into a price correction phase after seeing a consistent upward rally over these past few weeks.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Undergoes Price Correction, Sees Slight Dip Alongside Most Altcoins

description: Google is speculated to be making efforts to develop its Android operating system (OS) into a more desktop-oriented experience for tablets in a bid to keep up with competitors such as Apple’s iPad. It introduced a desktop windowing feature with the Android 15 QPR1 Beta 2 in September which enables users to apps simultaneously in free-form windows.
title: Google Developing Minimise Option and Other Features for Desktop Mode on Android: Report

description: Recent studies aim to determine the habitability of Saturn's moon Enceladus using improved chemical models. These tools simulate how organic compounds interact with icy environments under extreme conditions. The research, led by Charity Phillips-Lander and Florent Bocher, focuses on phenomena such as organic-doped ice pores, replicating conditions found on icy moons.
title: New Chemical Models Might Reveal Whether Icy Moons of Saturn and Jupiter Contain Life

description: A study published in Icarus explores the possibility that Mars’ moons, Phobos and Deimos, formed from asteroid debris torn apart by the planet’s gravitational forces. Researchers ran advanced simulations to propose this scenario, which fits the moons’ circular orbits better than previous theories. Japan’s upcoming MMX mission is expected to test this hypothesis by analysing samples from Phobos.
title: Mars' Moons Might Have Been Created From Asteroids Coming Too Close to the Red Planet

description: PlayStation veteran and games industry legend Shuhei Yoshida announced he was leaving Sony Interactive Entertainment (SIE), after a 31-year-long career at the company. The Sony executive, who currently heads the independent developer initiative at the company, will depart SIE on January 15, 2025.
title: 'It Was Like a Dream Job': PlayStation Veteran Shuhei Yoshida to Leave Sony After 31 Years

description: Young Liu, chairman of the contract manufacturer and key Apple supplier, told reporters after a forum in Taipei that it saw the primary impact of any fresh tariffs falling on its clients because its business model was based on contract manufacturing.
title: Taiwan's Foxconn Says Global Manufacturing Footprint to Shield it From Trump's Tariffs

description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese's centre-left government wants to pass the bill, which represents some of the toughest controls on children's social media use imposed by any country, into law by the end of the parliamentary year on Thursday.
title: Google, Meta Urge Australia to Delay Bill on Social Media Ban for Children

description: Apple has secured a patent for a security camera technology that is designed to identify individuals using both facial recognition as well as their physical characteristics. The patent describes a security camera system that utilises both facial recognition and a "bodyprint," which identifies people by images of their torso or attire.
title: Apple Wins Patent for Security Camera Technology That Identifies People Without Facial Recognition

description: Google has announced a new feature for Android which aims to make the process of switching to and setting up new devices a quicker and more efficient experience. The feature, called Restore Credentials, can automatically log users back into apps on devices once the switchover is complete, leveraging a restore key.
title: Android’s New Feature Will Automatically Log Users Back Into Apps When Switching Devices

description: Realme C75 has been launched in Vietnam with a MediaTek Helio G92 Max chipset paired with 8GB of RAM and an IP69-rated build for dust and water resistance. The smartphone is equipped with a 6,000mAh battery with support for 45W wired fast charging. It has a 50-megapixel main rear camera and an 8-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: Realme C75 With IP69 Rating, 6,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Huawei FreeBuds Pro 4 true wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds were launched in China on Tuesday. The new audio offering was released alongside the Huawei Mate X6 and Mate 70 series smartphones. The Huawei FreeBuds Pro 4 are the brand's first wireless earbuds to launch with HarmonyOS Next. This new operating system is likely to enable quick pairing with other Huawei devices.
title: Huawei FreeBuds Pro 4 TWS Earbuds With HarmonyOS Next, ANC Launched

description: The fourth Witcher game, codenamed Project Polatis, has entered full-scale production, developer CD Projekt Red announced Tuesday as it reported its third-quarter financial results for 2024. The studio said it had wrapped up pre-production on the game, set to be the first instalment in a new Witcher trilogy.
title: The Witcher 4 Moves to Full-Scale Production, Cyberpunk 2077 Crosses 30 Million Copies Sold

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra images have surfaced online, offering a look at the upcoming flagship smartphone. Although the launch is anticipated to take place in early 2025, leaked images showcasing the Galaxy S25 Ultra with an S Pen have emerged. Additionally, the device is depicted running One UI 7, Samsung's upcoming custom Android interface, slated to debut with the Galaxy S25 series the following year.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Design, One UI 7 Interface Spotted in Leaked Images

description: PC shipments in India reached an all-time high in the third quarter (Q3) of 2024, an analysis by a market research firm reveals. HP maintained its lead from the last quarter in the overall PC category, which comprises desktops, notebooks, and workstations, with over a million shipments.
title: Indian PC Shipments Reached 4.49 Million Mark In Q3 2024, HP Lead Overall Segment: IDC

description: Streambox Media has launched its latest range of QLED TVs called Dor in India, the company announced on Tuesday. The Indian startup, which is backed by Micromax Informatics, Nikhil Kamath, and Stride Ventures, offers the TV with a subscription-based TV service which negates the upfront cost of the QLED TV in favour of a TV-as-a-service model.
title: Streambox Dor QLED TV With Subscription-Based Services Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Realme’s GT 7 Pro packs in everything one would expect from an affordable flagship smartphone in India. This time, Realme's GT 7 Pro incorporates the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, which is currently absent from any flagship available in India. How does it perform, and are the cameras any good? Read on to find out.
title: Realme GT 7 Pro Review: A Numbers Game
